    • prepareStatement

      public int prepareStatement (String query, ArrayList<Object> values)
      Method to create a prepared statement and execute query, opens and close connection automatically
      Parameters:
      query - - Takes a string as a parameter to store the sql query
      values - - Takes an ArrayList of objects which store the parameters for the query
      Returns:
      - Returns an integer representing success or failure of query, 1 for success, 0 for failure

    • returnSetCond

      public ResultSet returnSetCond (String query, ArrayList<Object> values) throws SQLException
      Method to execute a prepared statement with parameters and return a ResultSet
      Parameters:
      query - - Takes a string as a parameter to store the sql query
      values - - Takes an ArrayList of objects which store the parameters for the query
      Returns:
      - Returns a ResultSet object with the results of query
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • returnSet

      public ResultSet returnSet (String query) throws SQLException
      Method to execute a prepared statement with no parameters and return a ResultSet
      Parameters:
      query - - Takes a string as a parameter to store the sql query
      Returns:
      - Returns a ResultSet object with the results of query
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Method which checks if connection is active
      Returns:
      - Returns a boolean true for connected, false for not connected

    • testConnection

      public boolean testConnection()
      Method which tests if connection is working correctly
      Returns:
      - Returns a boolean true for connection working, false for connection not working
